app.title: D2R Arcane Tracker
app.description: Automatic tracker for everything D2R related

setupWizard.title: Setup Wizard
setupWizard.description: Run the guided setup wizard to configure all essential settings at once. This is helpful if you want to review or change multiple settings quickly.

grail.title: Holy Grail Configuration
grail.includeNormalDescription: Track normal (non-ethereal) versions of items in your grail
grail.includeEtherealDescription: Track ethereal versions of items in your grail
grail.includeRunesDescription: Track individual runes (El, Eld, Tir, etc.) in your grail
grail.includeRunewordsDescription: Track completed runewords (Spirit, Insight, etc.) in your grail
grail.note: These settings affect which items are tracked in your Holy Grail. Changes will apply to new item discoveries and may affect your completion statistics.

gameMode.title: Game Mode
gameMode.bothDescription: Track items from both softcore and hardcore characters
gameMode.softcoreDescription: Track items only from softcore characters
gameMode.hardcoreDescription: Track items only from hardcore characters
gameMode.manualDescription: Manually enter items without automatic save file monitoring
gameMode.note: The game mode setting determines which characters' items are tracked. This affects item detection from save files and may influence your completion statistics.

gameVersion.title: Game Version
gameVersion.resurrectedDescription: Modern remaster with enhanced graphics and quality of life improvements
gameVersion.classicDescription: Original Diablo II with Lord of Destruction expansion
gameVersion.note: The game version setting affects item detection compatibility and may influence which save file formats are supported. Make sure to select the version that matches your Diablo II installation.

notifications.title: Notification Settings
notifications.soundDescription: Play sound when items are found
notifications.inAppDescription: Show notification cards in the app
notifications.nativeNote: Native notifications require browser permission. You'll be prompted to allow notifications when you first enable this setting.

theme.title: Appearance Settings
theme.note: System theme will automatically match your operating system's appearance preference.

saveFileMonitor.title: Save File Monitoring
saveFileMonitor.manualModeNotice: Save file monitoring is disabled because you have selected Manual Entry mode. Items must be entered manually when using this mode.
saveFileMonitor.confirmChangeDirectory: Are you sure you want to change the monitored save file directory?
saveFileMonitor.confirmRestoreDirectory: Are you sure you want to restore the monitored directory to the default location?
saveFileMonitor.deleteWarning: This action will permanently delete all characters and progress data.
saveFileMonitor.backupWarning: Make sure you have created a backup before proceeding if you want to keep your current progress.

database.title: Database
database.backupDescription: Create a backup of your database to preserve your progress
database.restoreDescription: Restore your database from a backup file
database.dropzoneText: Drag and drop a database file here, or
database.invalidFileError: Please select a valid database file (.db)
database.restoreSuccess: Database restored successfully! All data has been refreshed and is now up to date.
database.confirmRestore: Are you sure you want to restore the database from the backup?
database.replaceWarning: This action will permanently replace all current data.
database.keepCurrentWarning: Make sure you have created a backup of your current progress if you want to keep it.

d2rInstallation.title: D2R Installation
d2rInstallation.pathDescription: Path to your Diablo II: Resurrected installation directory. This setting is used by both item icon management and terror zone configuration.

update.title: Application Updates
update.latestVersion: You are running the latest version
update.note: The app automatically checks for updates on startup. A toast notification will appear in the bottom-left corner if an update is available. Manual checks show a detailed dialog with release notes.

updateDialog.installDescription: The update has been downloaded and is ready to install. The application will restart to complete the installation.
updateDialog.downloadDescription: A new version of the application is available. Would you like to download it now?

widget.title: Widget Settings
widget.enableDescription: Show an overlay widget with grail progress
widget.displayModeDescription: Overall: Total progress only | Split: Normal + Ethereal | All: All three gauges | Run Only: Current run counter
widget.showRunItemListDescription: In Run Only mode, show a compact text list of grail-relevant items found each run.
widget.positionDescription: The widget can be dragged, resized, and snaps to screen edges and corners
widget.featureAlwaysOnTop: Always on top of other windows
widget.featureDrag: Drag to reposition, resize by edges/corners
widget.featureSnap: Auto-snaps to screen edges and corners
widget.featureRealtime: Updates in real-time with grail progress

itemIcons.title: Item Icon Management
itemIcons.showItemIconsDescription: Display D2R item icons in cards
itemIcons.pathNotConfigured: D2R installation path is not configured
itemIcons.cascDescription: D2R stores game files in CASC (Content Addressable Storage Container) format. These files must be extracted before item icons can be converted.
itemIcons.openX64Version: Open the x64 version (or appropriate version for your OS)
itemIcons.selectD2rFolder: Select your D2R folder (e.g., C:\Program Files (x86)\Diablo II Resurrected)
itemIcons.clickData: Click "data" on the left side of the screen
itemIcons.clickDataExtract: Click "data" again from the newly opened options, then click "Extract" at the top
itemIcons.waitForExtraction: Wait for extraction (extracts ~40GB: global, hd, local folders to CascView work folder)
itemIcons.moveFolders: Move the 3 extracted folders to C:\Program Files (x86)\Diablo II Resurrected\Data
itemIcons.reloadToVerify: After extraction, reload this page to verify
itemIcons.extractionNote: Extraction is a one-time process and does not modify your game installation.
itemIcons.whyConversionDescription: Diablo II: Resurrected stores item icons in a proprietary .sprite format that cannot be directly displayed in web technologies. This tool converts those .sprite files into standard PNG images that can be rendered in the app.
itemIcons.aboutTheProcessDescription: Converted PNG images are stored in the app's data directory. Your game files will not be modified. The conversion is safe to run multiple times and only needs to be done once (or when game updates add new items).
itemIcons.convertDescription: This process will convert sprite files from your D2R installation to PNG format. Please review the following information:
itemIcons.spriteFilesReadFrom: Sprite files will be read from: Data/hd/global/ui/items (recursively)
itemIcons.convertedPngsSaved: Converted PNGs will be saved to the app's user data directory
itemIcons.gameFilesNotModified: Your game files will NOT be modified
itemIcons.idempotent: This process is idempotent (safe to run multiple times)
itemIcons.conversionMayTake: Conversion may take a few minutes depending on the number of files
itemIcons.disclaimer: While this process only reads game files and does not modify them, you proceed at your own risk. It is recommended to ensure your game installation is backed up.

runTracker.title: Run Tracker Settings
runTracker.autoModeUnavailableDescription: D2R 2.9 changed memory patterns that are required for automatic game detection. Manual run tracking using keyboard shortcuts still works.
runTracker.autoModeEnabled: Auto mode is enabled. Runs will start/end automatically when you enter/exit games in D2R. If D2R is not running or offsets are invalid, auto detection will not work.
runTracker.pollingIntervalDescription: How often to check memory for game state changes (100-5000ms). Lower values provide faster detection but use more CPU.
runTracker.autoModeWindowsOnly: Auto mode (memory reading) is only available on Windows. Manual run tracking is always available.
runTracker.keyboardShortcutsDescription: Configure keyboard shortcuts for run tracking actions
runTracker.pauseRunDescription: Toggle pause state for the current run.
runTracker.infoAutoMode: Auto mode uses memory reading to detect game start/end instantly (Windows only)
runTracker.infoRequires: Requires D2R.exe to be running and valid memory offsets configured
runTracker.infoFallback: If auto mode cannot work, you can always use manual run controls (keyboard shortcuts)
runTracker.infoManual: Manual controls are available at any time via the keyboard shortcuts above

shortcutRecorder.pressKeyCombination: Press desired key combination (Esc to cancel)
shortcutRecorder.includeNonModifier: Include a non-modifier key in the shortcut.

reportIssues.title: Report Issues
reportIssues.description: If you encounter any bugs or issues while using D2R Arcane Tracker, please report them on our GitHub repository. Your feedback helps us improve the application for everyone.

runAnalytics.startTrackingRuns: Start tracking runs to see analytics and statistics.

errorBoundary.title: Something went wrong
errorBoundary.description: An unexpected error occurred. You can try to recover or reload the application.
errorBoundary.persistHelp: If this error persists, please report it with the error details shown above.

calculator.title: Runeword Calculator
calculator.subtitle: Find which runewords you can craft with your available runes
calculator.thisMayTake: This may take a few moments
calculator.adjustFilters: Try adjusting your filters or search term

terrorZone.title: Terror Zone Configuration
terrorZone.warning: This feature modifies game files in your D2R installation. Any issues related to these changes are your own responsibility. Changes require a game restart to take effect.
terrorZone.pathNotConfigured: D2R installation path is not configured
terrorZone.cascDescription: D2R stores game files in CASC (Content Addressable Storage Container) format.
terrorZone.allFilesMustBeExtracted: All game files must be extracted
terrorZone.launchFlags: and D2R must be launched with the
terrorZone.flagsSuffix: flags for this feature to work.
terrorZone.createShortcut: Create a D2R shortcut and add
terrorZone.alwaysLaunchShortcut: Always launch D2R using this shortcut
terrorZone.extractionNote: Extraction is a one-time process and does not modify your game installation.
terrorZone.infoText: Changes to terror zone configuration require restarting Diablo II: Resurrected to take effect. The original file is automatically backed up and can be restored at any time.
terrorZone.restoreDescription: This will restore the original desecratedzones.json file from backup and clear your current configuration. This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to continue?

sessionCard.title: Session Card
sessionCard.startSessionPrompt: Start a session to begin tracking your runs and items.

controls.itemsAddedToCurrentRun: Items will be added to the current run, or the latest finished run if no run is active.
controls.startRunToAddItems: Start a run to add items manually.
controls.endCurrentRunDescription: Are you sure you want to end the current run? This action cannot be undone.
controls.endCurrentSessionDescription: Are you sure you want to end the current session? This will end any active run and cannot be undone.
